Title: The imposing hydropower station on the Xin'an River
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: A female guide shows a group of visitors composed of various 'National Minorities' the Xin'an River hydroelectric station (新安江水电站), in Chun'an County, Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province. The text under the picture stresses that it was designed by Chinese and built with Chinese equipment, meaning: without Russian aid.This is a print from the sixth edition (November 1964).
